title: Love and Fortune
overview: Love and Fortune is the story of Chok, a very unlucky young man where fate plays a prank and he had to be separated from his family at a young age. This made him decide to go out in search of his true birthplace. Fate, however, has led him to fall in love with Petchwasee, a noble woman with a good heartHow will the story of a love triangle, 1 woman, 2 men become a blood battle this time, and will the secret of the hidden birthplace be revealed?
